value:
Prince Alfonse and Princess Sharena
aren't attended by bodyguards.
Or so it seems...$k$pSurely, they must have a ninja or
two in the shadows. But if so,
I'm unable to detect any.

I serve Lord Ryoma, the future King
of Hoshido. I have long protected
him, no matter what the cost.

I appreciate that you do your patrols.
But I don't respond well to being
stared at. So don't.

You need training. Same goes for
everyone here. But you're crucial.
And especially defenseless.

I'm always watching over you from
the shadows. I've sensed you...
sense me. Good.$k$pBut not good enough. You miss me
most of the time. If I were an enemy,
you'd be in your grave by now.

You there. I suspect that you are
$Nu, hmm?$k$pThen my mission is nearly over.
I bring you greetings from
$Nf.
I can take on anyone.

Soon I will be worthy to serve
my liege.
Unacceptable.

Now I'm more worthy of being
fifth in a line of Saizos.

I am a Hoshidan ninja, fifth to bear the
proud name of Saizo. I hope you've
called me here with good reason.

Hmpf. You always spot me now
when I'm around. Not bad,
$Nu.$k$pYou couldn't for a while, you know.
I'd be standing right here, in front of
your face, and you'd be oblivious.$k$pYou, our great summoner, were
wide open to attack from the
shadows! Truly disturbing.$k$pAnd that's not all. I could follow
you for half the day without you
ever noticing that I was there.$k$pOh, now before you run away with
any foolish ideas, like maybe I
was watching out for you...$k$pI should set the matter straight—
that I was only monitoring
our weak link.$k$pIf you get taken out, then I'll be put
in danger. If I get taken out, then my
lord, Ryoma, loses my protection.$k$pWhat I'm trying to say is since
you got better at taking care of
yourself...$k$pI may be willing to watch out for
you from the shadows. A little.
せいっ
でやっ
ぐあっ！
くそっ…！
You have breathed your last.
Die.
Saizo the Fifth strikes.
Time for mayhem.
I failed...
Hmmm.
Sorry. Not the type to chat.
Hmm... Is the Order of Heroes some form of royal castle guard?
I never get tired. So don't insult me with coffee or tea. Or candy. Never candy.
You're our leader. So I will respect your authority. Doesn't mean I have to like it.
Why the blazes was I brought here, of all places?
Is Lord Ryoma here? I do have a higher duty, you know.
I'll do everything you command. But only so I can get back home to Hoshido faster!
Yes?
What?
Hmph.
